title: Pulisic rates 9/10 as win vs. Japan gets USMNT back on track
content: Christian Pulisic was among the USMNT's best as Mauricio Pochettino's men bounced back from Saturday's shocking loss against South Korea to defeat Japan 2-0.

title: Phillies' Schwarber 1st in NL to reach 50 homers
content: Philadelphia slugger Kyle Schwarber hit his 50th home run of the season, a three-run shot off reliever Justin Hagenman in the seventh inning that gave the Phillies a 7-1 lead en route to a comfortable 9-3 victory over the New York Mets on Tuesday night.

title: Balogun, Zendejas lead U.S. to big win over Japan
content: The United States picked up a big win over Japan in a friendly at Lower.com Field in Columbus, Ohio, on Tuesday night -- a result that gives Mauricio Pochettino's side some good news to end the September international window.

title: Judge passes Berra for fifth on Yankees' HR list
content: Yankees star Aaron Judge hit his 359th career homer Tuesday night, passing Yogi Berra for fifth most in Yankees history.

title: Astros' Garcia, after long TJ recovery, hurts elbow
content: Astros pitcher Luis Garcia, making his second start after sitting out more than two years while recovering from Tommy John surgery, exited with right elbow discomfort.

title: Buckeyes' Day no fan of proposed portal changes
content: Ohio State coach Ryan Day is not a fan of proposed changes to the NCAA transfer portal, saying the potential move to a single transfer window in January "doesn't make any sense."

title: Family has Franco admitted to mental health clinic
content: Suspended Rays shortstop Wander Franco was detained by police on request of his family and admitted into a clinic in the Dominican Republic for mental health issues.

content: We highlight the key moments from Cena's remarkable 23-year career before he retires the jorts in December.

title: Travis Hunter effect is alive in the 2025 college football season
content: There won't be another player like Hunter. But his play has inspired other teams to look for two-way stars.

content: Witt or Judge? Ohtani or De La Cruz? We narrow the field -- with a rep from every team -- to one true must-watch player.

content: Can Justin Fields and Aaron Rodgers sustain? Plus, Ben Solak begs the Giants to hold off on Jaxson Dart.

content: Burns noted that Daniels likes to talk on the field. Daniels pushed back on such a notion -- but not entirely.

content: The Eagles added some running back depth behind Saquon Barkley, but did they give up too much for Bigsby? We sized up the deal from both sides.

content: The hottest team and the top team aren't the always same. See our final 1-13 as the regular season wraps.

content: Coach Mike Brown, Kevin Durant, Myles Turner and others are ranked by who will be the most impactful on their new teams.

content: He won the most national titles of any Notre Dame football coach, but Frank Leahy's achievements in South Bend have been underappreciated.

content: The fourth quarter of the Bills-Ravens had it all -- including bettors putting down huge amounts on high odds.

content: As odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national title, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet each of them.

title: Explaining USWNT star Alyssa Thompson's move from Angel City to Chelsea
content: Alyssa Thompson's high-priced move has implications for the USWNT, NWSL, Chelsea, Angel City and the player herself. Let's break it all down.

title: Tuchel earns first statement win as England boss, as World Cup hopes rise
content: England's 5-0 win over Serbia in World Cup qualifying has given Thomas Tuchel the confidence to feel that he is finally making the right progress as manager.

title: Can anyone stop Lamine Yamal and Spain marching to World Cup glory?
content: Spain's 6-0 win in Turkey was an exquisite recital of sublime football that has Lamine Yamal, Pedri & Co. looking like World Cup winners in waiting. Can they be stopped?

title: The strangely specific transfer obsessions of elite clubs, and what the summer window taught us about them
content: Every team has preferences when it comes to transfers ... but some are more surprising than others. What did we learn this summer about Real Madrid's, Arsenal's and other elite clubs' fixations?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Madrid eye move for Stuttgart's Stiller
content: Real Madrid are reportedly keeping tabs on a possible move for VfB Stuttgart midfielder Angelo Stiller.

title: NFL Week 1's top performance? Check the fan-voted 'Himmy' Award leaderboard
content: Fans weighed in on Week 1's top players, casting their votes for the 'Himmy' Award between Josh Allen, Aaron Rodgers, Emeka Egbuka and Daniel Jones.

title: Canelo vs. Crawford: History of boxers moving up in weight
content: Terence Crawford is not the first fighter to move up multiple divisions for better challenges. How did the other boxers do?

title: All you need to know about Saturday's fight
content: Andreas Hale explains why Canelo Alvarez and Terence Crawford are fighting, what it means for boxing and more.

title: Real or not? 14 contenders, 14 reasons they can -- or can't? -- win the World Series
content: Lack of power? Bullpen holes? Injured stars? Why each contender's biggest weakness will -- or won't -- sink them in October.

title: Three young arms are here to carry the Mets into October
content: The rookie trio of Nolan McLean, Jonah Tong and Brandon Sproat looks to lift New York's fortunes this season.

title: ‚ÄòNatural partners‚Äô: PM Modi responds to Trump; both confident on trade talks
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi responded to President Trump's remarks on trade negotiations, affirming India and the US as close friends and natural partners. He expressed confidence that ongoing discussions will unlock the limitless potential of their partnership. Modi anticipates speaking with Trump soon, aiming for a brighter future for both nations as teams work to conclude negotiations swiftly.

title: Deadly protests: Is Nepal returning to monarchy? What prophecy says
content: Nepal is witnessing a surge of protests. Initially sparked by Gen Z against social media bans, demonstrations now target government corruption, raising questions about Prime Minister Oli's successor. Simultaneously, pro-royalist movements are gaining momentum, demanding the monarchy's restoration amidst frustration over post-monarchy instability. However, a centuries-old prophecy and constitutional hurdles pose significant challenges to Gyanendra's return, despite growing calls.

title: ‚ÄòNot thrilled‚Äô: Trump voices displeasure over Israeli strike in Qatar; to issue statement
content: President Trump expressed his displeasure with Israel's strike on Hamas leaders in Doha, Qatar, which resulted in civilian casualties and strained relations. The attack, conducted without prior notification to the US, jeopardizes ceasefire efforts and drew condemnation from Qatar. While acknowledging the goal of eliminating Hamas, Trump criticized the unilateral action in a sovereign nation.

title: '100% tariff': US official says Trump proposed higher duties on Russian oil buyers India, China
content: US reportedly considers increased tariffs on nations buying Russian oil, including India. Donald Trump suggests tariffs of 50-100% on buyers like China and India. Trump wants the EU to act alongside the US. Discussions involved US and EU officials, plus Ukraine's prime minister. This comes as Trump said he looked forward to speaking with PM Narendra Modi soon to resolve trade barriers.

title: With iPhone 17 series, iPhone price in India crosses Rs 2 lakh
content: Apple has launched the iPhone 17 series in India. The iPhone 17 Pro Max 2TB costs Rs 2,29,900. The phones come in deep blue, cosmic orange, and silver. The iPhone 17 Pro has a starting price of Rs 134,900. The new phones have better displays and the A19 Pro chip. The camera system includes three 48MP Fusion cameras.

title: Top stocks to buy today: Stock recommendations for September 10, 2025 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations:Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi Shares recommends buying Raymond Lifestyle, citing a bullish cup and handle pattern and strong momentum, targeting ‚Çπ1,450-‚Çπ1,500. Brainbees is also a buy, with a range breakout and strong base formation suggesting a move towards ‚Çπ480. Titagarh Rail Systems, benefiting from renewed railway sector interest, is poised for a range breakout with a target of ‚Çπ950.

title: VP election: NDA's CP Radhakrishnan elected with more-than-expected margin
content: Chandrapuram Ponnusamy Radhakrishnan of the BJP-led NDA is India's new Vice-President. He defeated B Sudershan Reddy. Radhakrishnan secured 452 votes, while Reddy got 300. The opposition's vote count fell short. Fifteen votes were declared invalid. Congress claims opposition MPs stood united. Some parties are under scrutiny for potential cross-voting. The opposition alleges vote theft. The ideological battle continues.

title: Solar eclipse 2025: When is Surya Grahan; will it be visible in India?
content: September 2025 features a rare celestial double feature: a dramatic lunar eclipse on the 7th and a partial solar eclipse on the 21st. The solar eclipse, dubbed the "equinox eclipse," will be visible at sunrise in the Southern Hemisphere, particularly in New Zealand, eastern Australia, and parts of the South Pacific.

title: Google tightens AI use: Coders face strict rules; external tools prohibited
content: Google is mandating its software engineers to exclusively use internal AI models for coding, driven by CEO Sundar Pichai's call for AI adoption to maintain competitiveness. Employees are expected to demonstrate AI proficiency, potentially influencing performance reviews and career advancement.

title: 'Wanted nuclear attack': Suryakumar Yadav slammed for shaking hands with Mohsin Naqvi
content: Political tensions between India and Pakistan have overshadowed the 2025 Asia Cup, intensified by the Pahalgam attack and cross-border firing. A handshake between India's captain Suryakumar Yadav and Pakistan's Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi at a pre-tournament press conference sparked controversy and backlash from Indian fans, given Naqvi's anti-India rhetoric and dual role as a political figure and cricket administrator.

title: Asia Cup match today: India vs UAE - time in IST, live streaming, TV channel
content: India, fresh off their T20 World Cup victory, are set to begin their Asia Cup 2025 campaign against hosts United Arab Emirates at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium. Led by Suryakumar Yadav, the defending champions aim for a record-extending ninth title. India holds a strong record with 24 wins since last year's global tournament.

title: Ericsson job cuts in Canada: Around 100 employees impacted; staff notified
content: Swedish telecom giant Ericsson is cutting around 100 technical jobs in Canada, according to reports. The move, announced on September 8th with an effective date of October 31st, is part of a global streamlining effort. Ericsson aims to align its Canadian network management services with worldwide operations, utilizing common tools and processes.

title: Asia Cup : 'Shaant' and 'shaitaan'; story of Shubman Gill, Abhishek Sharma's friendship
content: Shubman Gill and Abhishek Sharma will most likely walk out to open in India's first match in the Asia Cup on Wednesday. It won‚Äôt be the first time the duo will open ‚Äî they have been doing this since their U-14 days. Beyond being opening partners, they have been childhood friends and understand each other‚Äôs game as well.

title: Shreyas Iyer's shocking revelation: 'I was paralysed, nerve snapped, rod in my back'
content: Shreyas Iyer disclosed a career-threatening back injury that led to paralysis in one leg and his subsequent omission from the BCCI's central contract list. Despite enduring excruciating pain and a year-long recovery after surgery, Iyer remains determined to regain his place in the Indian squad.

title: Amitabh Bachchan's granddaughter Navya Nanda meets Apple CEO Tim Cook
content: Navya Naveli Nanda, granddaughter of Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan, recently attended an event at Apple‚Äôs headquarters in Cupertino, California. The entrepreneur shared glimpses from the day on Instagram, including pictures with Apple CEO Tim Cook. One video in particular caught fans‚Äô attention, as it also featured singer Armaan Malik.

title: Ciara‚Äôs son with rapper Future now carries Russell Wilson‚Äôs last name
content: Ciara Wilson has legally added her husband Russell Wilson's last name to her eldest son, Future Zahir's, name, reflecting Russell's significant role as a stepfather. This decision, years in the making, symbolizes the couple's commitment to their blended family. Russell's philosophy of loving all children equally resonates with their united and supportive family dynamic.

title: What awaits PM Modi's unannounced visit to Manipur amid ethnic tensions?
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's northeast tour includes a planned but unconfirmed visit to Manipur on September 13, amidst heightened security and ethnic tensions. While his Mizoram and Assam schedules are public, the Manipur leg remains shrouded in secrecy, fueling speculation.

title: iPhone Air, iPhone 17, Pro & Pro Max launched: India price, specs; all details
content: Apple unveiled its 2025 iPhone lineup, featuring the iPhone Air, iPhone 17, and Pro models. All boast 120Hz displays and 48MP Fusion cameras. The iPhone Air stands out as the thinnest model, while Pro versions see the return of aluminum frames. Pre-orders and India pricing were also announced.

title: 'Looking forward to speak with my good friend Modi': Trump says India-US trade talks to continue
content: President Donald Trump announced ongoing trade negotiations between the US and India, expressing optimism for a successful resolution and reaffirming his friendship with Prime Minister Modi. Despite past trade tensions, including tariffs on Indian goods and Russian oil imports, Trump emphasised the "very special" relationship between the two nations. Modi reciprocated the positive sentiment, signaling a potential thaw in trade relations.

title: Minnesota Lynx vs Indiana Fever injury report: Who‚Äôs playing & who's not; check details
content: The Minnesota Lynx are favored to win against the Indiana Fever on September 9, 2025, despite both teams facing injury challenges. The Fever are significantly weakened by season-ending injuries to key players like Caitlin Clark. While the Lynx will miss Napheesa Collier and DiJonai Carrington, their superior record and balanced team make them a formidable opponent.

title: Who is Keeta Vaccaro? Tyreek Hill‚Äôs estranged wife; abuse claims in divorce
content: Tyreek Hill, the Miami Dolphins' wide receiver, faces serious allegations from his estranged wife, Keeta Vaccaro, who claims he was physically abusive during their 17-month marriage. Vaccaro alleges violent incidents, including one at an Orlando hotel, prompting her to file for divorce in April 2025. Hill's legal team denies these accusations amidst ongoing legal proceedings.

title: SA20 Auction 2025 Results: Complete list of who went where & how much they cost
content: Dewald Brevis became the costliest player in SA20 history, fetching R16.5 million from Pretoria Capitals after a fierce bidding war. Aiden Markram, a two-time SA20 champion, was acquired by Durban‚Äôs Super Giants for R14 million. Veteran Imran Tahir joined Joburg Super Kings, while notable players like Andile Phehlukwayo and Mustafizur Rahman went unsold.

title: 'Recipe for disaster': Savannah James warns about marriage risks
content: Savannah James, wife of LeBron James, shared her insights on the importance of being ready before committing to marriage, emphasizing that rushing into it can be a recipe for disaster. The couple, who have been together since they were teenagers, married after dating for nearly a decade. Despite maintaining a private life amidst rumors, they continue to thrive together.

title: VP election: CP Radhakrishnan hails win as triumph of 'nationalistic ideology'
content: CP Radhakrishnan, NDA's candidate, was elected as India's 15th Vice President, securing 452 votes. He attributed his victory to the triumph of "nationalistic ideology," emphasising the importance of development over politics. Prime Minister Modi congratulated Radhakrishnan, acknowledging his extensive public service and anticipating his significant contribution to the nation's advancement.

title: Asian Cup Qualifiers: Blasts in Doha; India U23 crush Brunei 6-0 amid security fears
content: India's U23 football team triumphed over Brunei 6-0 in the AFC U23 Asian Cup Qualifiers, led by Vibin Mohanan's hat-trick. Despite the victory and finishing with six points, qualification hinges on other match results. Celebrations were muted amidst reports of explosions in Doha, allegedly targeting Hamas leaders by Israeli forces.

title: AFG vs HK, Asia Cup: Atal, Omarzai shine; Afghanistan kick off with 94-run win
content: Afghanistan started their Asia Cup campaign strongly, defeating Hong Kong by 94 runs. Sediqullah Atal's unbeaten 73 and Azmatullah Omarzai's quickfire 53 propelled Afghanistan to 188/6. Hong Kong's chase crumbled under the pressure of Afghanistan's disciplined bowling attack, led by Fazalhaq Farooqi and Gulbadin Naib, ultimately restricting them to just 94/9.

title: Asia Cup: New Record! Omarzai becomes fastest batter to achieve rare feat
content: Azmatullah Omarzai smashed a blistering 50 off just 20 balls to power Afghanistan to a commanding total in their Asia Cup opener against Hong Kong. His record-breaking knock, eclipsing Mohammad Nabi‚Äôs previous best, fueled a late onslaught that saw Afghanistan pile up 78 runs in the last five overs. Hong Kong‚Äôs sloppy fielding, marked by several dropped catches, only added to Afghanistan‚Äôs momentum in the closing stages.

title: Fantasy hockey defense tiers: The elite, the roster fillers and everyone in between
content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed defensemen tiers and a guide to the position.

title: Forward tier list: From must-haves to lottery tickets
content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed forward tiers and a guide to the position.

title: ‚ÄòPhillies Karen‚Äô identified, fired after taking Bader HR ball from kid
content: During a Phillies vs. Marlins game, Harrison Bader's home run ball was caught by Drew Feltwell, who gifted it to his son Lincoln. A woman demanded the ball, sparking outrage online and earning her the moniker "Phillies Karen." Despite mistaken identity claims involving Leslie-Ann Kravitz and Cheryl Richardson-Wagner, the woman's true identity remains unconfirmed.

title: Hilarious! Chess fan asks American GM his name after photo - Watch
content: Hans Niemann, amid the FIDE Grand Swiss, experienced an unexpected viral moment when a young fan, after taking a picture, asked for his name, creating a humorous and awkward encounter. The incident amused the chess community. Niemann's tournament performance has been varied, including draws and a recent victory, maintaining his status as a closely watched player.

Sengottaiyan recently setting a 10-day deadline for the AIADMK to initiate the process of bringing all members of the Dravidian major back to the organisation, there has been a renewed interest among sections of political leaders and journalists in Su. content: Around 50 residents got together and said that the decision to rename 5th Trust Cross Street goes against the naming convention followed in their area, where Trust Cross Streets numbering 1 to 14 exist. Moreover, they said, the existing name is a silent tribute to the CIT that developed the entire locality

content: In this seventh instalment, the subsidy for the period from April 2025 to July 2025 was given to the beneficiaries

content: The 504-page chargesheet containing elaboration on the incidents leading to self-immolation by the girls was filed before the court of sub-divisional judicial magistrate in Balasore

title: Assam Cabinet approves SOP under Immigrants Expulsion Act
content: The standard operating procedure is aimed at guiding the District Commissioners and Senior Superintendents of Police to expel illegal immigrants from Assam, Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma said

title: In a first, Indian Armed Forces‚Äô all-women sailing team to circumnavigate the globe
content: The expedition will include crossing the equator twice and rounding the three Great Capes, i.e. Cape Leeuwin in Australia, Cape Horn in South America and the Cape of Good Hope in South Africa.

title: Bombay High Court rejects Rajan Vichare‚Äôs plea against Naresh Mhaske‚Äôs Lok Sabha victory
content: Bombay High Court dismissed Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Rajan Vichare‚Äôs plea challenging Naresh Mhaske‚Äôs 2024 Lok Sabha victory, ruling that his election affidavit was valid and that disclosure of conviction was unnecessary as Mhaske faced no imprisonment. ¬†

title: Union government seeks ‚Äòfactual report‚Äô on forest rights complaint concerning Nicobar project
content: Tribal Affairs Ministry has written to the Chief Secretary of Andaman and Nicobar Islands seeking report on a complaint that the administration falsely certified completing identification and settlement of forest rights

content: Former Haryana Chief Minister says the compensation being given is inadequate, and it should be ‚Çπ50,000-‚Çπ60,000 per acre as the farmers have suffered huge losses

content: It contains the provisions for life imprisonment and fines up to ‚Çπ1 crore; will help in maintaining ‚Äòpeace and harmony‚Äô in the society, says MoS (Home); Cong. boycotts debate, stages a walkout

title: Karnataka set to get investment of ‚Çπ1,000 crore in bioenergy sector as KSBDB inks pact with German agency
content: Karnataka‚Äôs bioenergy sector is set to get a boost with Hamburg Invest, a financial institution of Germany, signing a Letter of Intent with the Karnataka State Bioenergy Development Board to facilitate investment of ‚Çπ1,000 crore in bioenergy-related projects

title: Victory of nationalist ideology, says Radhakrishnan on win
content: The Vice-President-elect said that in a democracy, ‚Äúboth the ruling party and Opposition parties are important‚Äù. ‚ÄúIt is like two sides of the same coin,‚Äù he said

title: Congress top brass holds meeting on Assembly elections in Bihar
content: Though there was no official word on what transpired in the meeting, sources indicated that the leadership discussed strategies to carry forward the momentum generated by the yatra and build a narrative

title: SPCA lacks teeth, needs enforcement powers to rein in errant cops
content: Though it has been constituted under  Section 110 of the Kerala Police Act for examining complaints against police officers of and up to the said rank of Deputy Superintendent of Police, it lacks enforcement measures. Chairman says without such powers, SPCA can only recommend action

content: This comes in a bid to address the issue of unscheduled load shedding affecting the 24x7 water supply system in Hubballi-Dharwad

content: NDA gets 13 votes more than its strength in two Houses, suggesting crossvoting; Opposition claims that out of 315 votes it expected, 300 were cast for its candidate, while 15 votes were invalidated

title: Assam doctor asked to explain 21 C-sections in 10 hours
content: Senior gynaecologist Kantheswar Bordoloi said a single caesarean takes 15-25 minutes, depending on the degree of complication

content: The plaintiff submits that the purported will allegedly executed by their father ‚Äòis not a legal and valid document, is forged and fabricated and in any event surrounded by suspicious circumstances‚Äô

title: Army Chief stresses the need for technological edge to stay ahead of rivals
content: The goalposts will keep changing. Because it is not only me, it is the adversary that is also enhancing his technology. I need to make sure my technological level is ready to beat its impact

title: C.P. Radhakrishnan: affable organisation man who doesn‚Äôt play political games
content: Untainted by corruption and having remained above petty organisational politics, Mr. Radhakrishnan is seen as someone who can steer the Rajya Sabha with a similar reach across both sides of the aisle.

title: Horatti writes to Speaker expressing displeasure over him taking ‚Äòunilateral decisions‚Äô
content: Council Chairman unhappy over drawing up of the official travel plan to Barbados where Commonwealth conference is getting under way in October; says Assembly and Council are two faces of the same coin.

content: MEA told to take necessary steps to ensure the safety of the Malayalis stranded in Kathmandu: Union Minister

title: After let up in rains, State registers sharp rise in energy use
content: The Southern Discom has availed 203.38 MU energy with the peak load clocked at 10,450 MW, the highest ever during the monsoon season

title: India hosts global audit leaders to promote tech-driven good governance
content: The event with participation from over 29 countries focuses on how emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), data analytics and geospatial tools can improve public audit systems and citizen-focused transparent governance

title: GST tweaks: paper merchants flag anomalies, elevator makers seek lowering of levy for households
content: A major concern is the anomalous GST treatment given to notebooks, textbooks and the paper used in their production, paper traders pointed out

title: Mamata urges people on border with Nepal to keep the peace
content: The Trinamool Congress chairperson stressed that foreign policy is the domain of the central government. The CM had taken a similar stand when Sheikh Hasina‚Äôs regime fell in Bangladesh

title: Manipur Naga body imposes ‚Äòtrade embargo‚Äô to protest border fencing
content: The United Naga Council said it is the first step in non-cooperation with the government to protest the move to fence the India-Myanmar border

content: He invited Tiruppur industry leaders to participate in a forthcoming roundtable conference to be chaired by Minister for Agriculture and Textiles Tummala Nageswara Rao

title: Three soldiers killed as avalanche hits Army base camp in Siachen
content: The avalanche hit the camp located at an altitude of around 12,000 feet, trapping the soldiers under snow. Two of the deceased were Agniveers

title: TTD honours vegetable donors
content: Additional Executive Officer calls for dynamic mapping to streamline supplies and prevent duplication

title: Organised attempt afoot to manipulate electoral rolls in closely contested seats, alleges B.R. Patil ¬†
content: Covert teams are hired to profile voter preferences and try to get those voters favouring their opponent deleted from the electoral rolls without their consent or knowledge, says the Congress legislator

title: "Keep Them On": Trump Asks EU To Slap Tariffs Of Up To 100% On India, China
content: US President Donald Trump has reportedly asked the EU to join the United States in slapping tariffs up to 100 per cent on India and China as part of their so-called collective effort to increase pressure on Moscow to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Thar Crashes Out Of Delhi Showroom, Lands On Road Below
content: A person accidentally drove a Mahindra Thar through a glass wall of a showroom in east Delhi's Preet Vihar right after purchasing it, police on Tuesday said.

title: Mangaluru's Highway To Hell: Woman Falls Into Pothole, Gets Run Over By Truck
content: The crumbling stretch of National Highway-66 near Kulur in Mangaluru has turned into a highway to hell with repeated instances of road accidents. On Tuesday, a woman rider died after her scooter hit a pothole and she was run over by a lorry.

title: "Your Elevation...": J Dhankhar's Hails Successor In 1st Remarks Since Exit
content: Former vice president Jagdeep Dhankhar on Tuesday extended greetings to his successor C P Radhakrishnan, saying that the office of the vice president will attain greater glory with his vast experience.

title: Microsoft Mandates 3-Day Work-From-Office For Employees By February 2026
content: Microsoft will require employees to work from the office at least three days a week starting next year, the company said in a blog post on Tuesday.

title: Nepal Protest Live Updates: Army Takes Charge Of Security, World Calls For Peace
content: Nepal Protest Live Updates: In Nepal, demonstrations against the short-lived social media ban and corruption¬†grew increasingly violent on Tuesday, with protesters setting¬†government buildings and politicians‚Äô homes on fire.

title: Customers In Brothels Can Be Prosecuted For Immoral Trafficking: Kerala High Court
content: The Kerala High Court has ruled that individuals availing sexual services in brothels can be prosecuted under the Immoral Traffic (Prevention) Act, 1956 (ITP Act), holding that payment for such services amounts to inducing prostitution.

title: "Pleased To Announce That India, US Are...": Trump On 'Trade Barriers'
content: US President Donald Trump said Tuesday that trade talks with India would continue, despite strained ties since his imposition of 50-percent tariffs over New Delhi's purchases of Russian oil.

title: India Says "Deeply Concerned" Over Israeli Strikes In Qatar, Urges Diplomacy
content: India on Tuesday expressed deep concern over reports of Israeli airstrikes in Doha, Qatar, urging all parties to exercise restraint and prioritise diplomatic engagement to prevent further escalation in the region.

title: "Not The Way I Speak": Trump Dismisses Alleged Epstein Birthday Letter
content: US President Donald Trump denied Tuesday that he had signed or authored a birthday letter to disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein, a day after the alleged note was released to the public.

title: In Big Relief For Trump, US Supreme Court Allows To Freeze Billions In Foreign Aid
content: Chief Justice John Roberts on Tuesday temporarily kept in place the Trump administration's decision to freeze nearly $5 billion in foreign aid.

title: Trump Urges EU To Impose 100% Tariffs On India, China To Pressure Putin: Report
content: U.S. President Donald Trump urged EU officials on Tuesday to hit China with tariffs of up to 100% as part of a strategy to pressure Russian President Vladimir Putin, according to a U.S. official and an EU diplomat.

title: UN Security Council To Hold Emergency Meeting Today On Israel's Qatar Strikes
content: The UN Security Council will hold an emergency meeting on Wednesday in response to Israel's strikes targeting Hamas officials in Qatar, diplomatic sources told AFP.

title: Naga Body Blocks Manipur Highways, Asks Centre To Stop Border Fencing
content: The United Naga Council that represents the Naga tribes of Manipur has launched what it calls a "trade embargo" in protest against the Centre's decision to end the free movement regime (FMR) and build a fence along the 1,643-km India-Myanmar border.

title: Nepali Man Arrested For Supplying Indian SIM Cards To Pakistan's ISI: Cops
content: A Nepali national, who was allegedly lured by Pakistan's ISI with the promise of a US visa and opportunities in journalism, has been arrested by the Delhi Police for supplying Indian SIM cards that were used by spy agency for espionage activities.

title: "Baseless": Qatar Rejects US Prior Warning Claims Of Israeli Strike
content: Soon after White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said in her press briefing that the United States administration had informed the Qatari government about Israel's "impending strikes" on Doha, Qatar denied receiving any prior information and c

title: US Supreme Court Agrees To Hear Trump Tariff Case In November
content: The US Supreme Court on Tuesday agreed to hear arguments in November on the legality of President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, after his administration asked for an expedited ruling on the issue.

title: "Not A Decision By Me": Trump On Israeli Strikes On Qatar
content: US President Donald Trump denied any role Tuesday in Israel's strikes on Qatar, saying the decision to launch the attacks was Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's and not his.

title: IndiGo Suspends Kathmandu Flights Amid Protest In Nepal
content: IndiGo Airlines on Tuesday issued a travel advisory announcing the suspension of all flights to and from Kathmandu until 12:00 pm on September 10, citing the closure of Kathmandu Airport due to the Gen Z Protest.

title: "Nationalistic Ideology" Overall Winner: Veep-Elect's Jibe At Opposition
content: Vice President elect CP Radhakrishnan said this evening that the elections for the post conducted earlier today made it clear that "nationalistic ideology" is the overall winner.

content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . early reports call for the weather to cooperate around the league . a 712-game lead in your division and a 412game edge for the best record in the league is being able to put less pressure on your rotation in order to keep it fresh .

title: 'That kid is so tough': Caden Durham wants to drive LSU to the finish
content: the 205-pound linebacker is the top high school running back in his class in Texas . he wears his normal size 11 cleats, no steel plate lining the bottom, no more padded insoles . "the prototype," running backs coach Frank Wilson says of what we are looking for .

title: What happened to Oklahoma State? Is USF the team to watch?
content: the ACC and Big Ten show they have multiple teams in contention for the college football playoff . south Florida beat yet another AP Top 25 team and Oklahoma State suffered its biggest loss in over 100 years . our college football experts break down key takeaways from Week 2 performances .

title: How Missouri's pair of five-star recruits fit, plus more 2026 commitment breakdowns
content: a total of 18 five-stars are atop the ESPN 100 player rankings for the men's college basketball class of 2026 . three are off the board as of early September . most recently, no. 12 JaShawn Andrews was the first of this group, announcing his commitment to Arkansas .

title: Fantasy reaction: Bigsby trade a boon to Etienne's fantasy value
content: the fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . a big spike in Jacory Croskey-Merritt's start rate after his nice performance in Week 1 . Travis Etienne Jr. is the biggest winner here after leading the team .

title: MMA divisional rankings: How much did Nassourdine Imavov rise at middleweight?
content: Nassourdine Imavov beats caio Borralho in the uFC Fight Night main event . he moves up to no. 3 in the latest ESPN middleweight rankings . the other weight class in which rankings change is heavyweight, where Marcin Tybura drops out of the top 10 .

title: Power Rankings: How did each Top 25 team look in Week 2?
content: the limited sample size highlighted some possible concerns for contenders . LSU , Penn State and Georgia had a hard time pulling away from inferior competition in Week 2 . a last-minute defensive breakdown doomed the defending Big 12 champs against Mississippi State .

title: What to know about all 32 playcallers in the NFL: We have key trends to watch for every team
content: the 2025 season is underway, which means we got our first look at new playcallers such as the Detroit Lions ' John Morton, Tampa Bay Buccaneers ' Josh Grizzard and the Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles' each of them will carry the dual responsibility of coaching and calling offensive plays .

title: 49ers put tight end Kittle on IR, cut kicker Moody
content: the 49ers placed tight end George Kittle on injured reserve with a hamstring injury . the last of those games is set for "Thursday Night Football" the earliest Kittle could return would be for the Oct. 12 game at the Tampa Bay Buccaneers .

title: Waiver wire: The key players to add before Week 2
content: Aaron Rodgers is a must-start in week 2 for superflex formats . the season has kicked off but there's still time to start fresh with a 0-0 record . a league wi-fi will be available in at least 50% of standard leagues .

title: NFL says Carter's ejection serves as suspension
content: the Philadelphia Eagles star will not miss any future games for spitting on quarterback dak Prescott . the league would consider the second-year defensive tackle to have served a one-game suspension . this is an important distinction by the NFL, which establishes a precedent . he will forfeit his week 1 game check worth $57,222 .

title: Week 2 Power Rankings: Stacking the teams, plus top newcomer performances
content: the Minnesota Vikings beat the Chicago Bears on "Monday Night Football" the Packers finished their opening week of the 2025 season with a comeback win . the Pittsburgh Steelers, the Green Bay Packers and the Buffalo Bills topped their power rankings .

title: What makes a baseball player exciting? We asked two rising MLB stars
content: a baseball player bracket skews young, with the average age (26.4) more than two years younger than the MLB average (28.6) . the bracket embodies several common qualities among our 32 entrants . "i just like seeing guys who can do a lot of different things on the field," says a representative .
